mapper.select: SELECT T.TEAM_CODE , TEAM_NAME , MEMBER_CODE , TEAM_INTRO , TEAM_LOCATION , I.TEAM_LOGO_IMG_ATTACHED_NAME , I.TEAM_LOGO_IMG_CODE FROM TEAM T, TEAM_LOGO_IMG I WHERE T.TEAM_CODE = I.TEAM_CODE AND T.TEAM_CODE = #{teamCode}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET TEAM_CODE = NULL , TEAM_ADMIN = '1' WHERE TEAM_CODE = #{teamCode}
mapper.select: SELECT T.TEAM_CODE , T.TEAM_NAME , TI.TEAM_LOGO_IMG_ORIGN_NAME , R.RANK_TOTAL_SCORE , (SELECT COUNT(INNER_M.MEMBER_CODE) FROM MEMBER INNER_M , TEAM INNER_T WHERE INNER_T.TEAM_CODE = INNER_M.TEAM_CODE AND INNER_T.TEAM_CODE = T.TEAM_CODE) AS MEMBERCOUNT FROM RANK R, TEAM_LOGO_IMG TI, TEAM T WHERE T.TEAM_CODE = TI.TEAM_CODE AND T.TEAM_CODE = R.TEAM_CODE ORDER BY RANK_TOTAL_SCORE DESC

SELECT M.MEMBER_NAME , MEMBER_GENDER , MEMBER_TELL , TEAM_ADMIN , POSITION , (SELECT MEMBER_IMG_ATTACHED_NAME FROM MEMBER_IMG WHERE MEMBER_CODE = M.MEMBER_CODE) AS MEMBER_IMG_ATTACHED_NAME FROM MEMBER M WHERE M.TEAM_CODE = #{teamCode}

SELECT MEMBER_NAME , MEMBER_CODE , POSITION , (SELECT MEMBER_IMG_ATTACHED_NAME FROM MEMBER_IMG IM WHERE IM.MEMBER_CODE = M.MEMBER_CODE) AS MEMBER_IMG_ATTACHED_NAME FROM MEMBER M WHERE M.TEAM_CODE = #{teamCode}

SELECT MEMBER_NAME , POSITION , (SELECT MEMBER_IMG_ATTACHED_NAME FROM MEMBER_IMG IM WHERE IM.MEMBER_CODE = M.MEMBER_CODE) AS MEMBER_IMG_ATTACHED_NAME , TEAM_ADMIN , MEMBER_GENDER , MEMBER_TELL , MEMBER_CODE FROM MEMBER M WHERE M.MEMBER_CODE = #{memberCode}

SELECT M.MEMBER_CODE , POSITION , MEMBER_NAME , MEMBER_GENDER , (SELECT MEMBER_IMG_ATTACHED_NAME FROM MEMBER_IMG WHERE MEMBER_CODE = T.MEMBER_CODE) AS MEMBER_IMG_ATTACHED_NAME FROM MEMBER M , TEAM_APPLY T WHERE T.TEAM_CODE = #{teamCode} AND M.MEMBER_CODE = T.MEMBER_CODE AND APPLY_SORT = '1'
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET TEAM_CODE = NULL , TEAM_ADMIN = '1' WHERE MEMBER_CODE = #{memberCode}
mapper.select: SELECT MATCH.MATCH_CODE , MATCH_WRITER AS HOME_TEAM_NAME , (SELECT TEAM_NAME FROM TEAM WHERE TEAM.TEAM_CODE = MATCH_MANAGE.TEAM_CODE_AWAY AND MATCH_MANAGE.MATCH_MANAGE_RESPONSE = '수락') AS AWAY_TEAM_NAME , MATCH_RESULT_HOMETEAM_SCORE , MATCH_RESULT_AWAYTEAM_SCORE , MATCH_DATE , MATCH_START_TIME , MATCH_END_TIME FROM MATCH, MATCH_RESULT, MATCH_MANAGE WHERE MATCH.MATCH_CODE = MATCH_RESULT.MATCH_CODE(+) AND MATCH.MATCH_CODE = MATCH_MANAGE.MATCH_CODE AND (MATCH.TEAM_CODE = #{teamCode} OR MATCH.TEAM_CODE_AWAY = #{teamCode}) AND MATCH.MATCH_POSSIBLE = '2' AND MATCH_MANAGE.MATCH_MANAGE_RESPONSE = '수락' AND MATCH_RESULT_HOMETEAM_SCORE IS NOT NULL ORDER BY MATCH_CODE

SELECT MATCH.MATCH_CODE , MATCH_WRITER AS HOME_TEAM_NAME , (SELECT TEAM_NAME FROM TEAM WHERE TEAM.TEAM_CODE = MATCH_MANAGE.TEAM_CODE_AWAY AND MATCH_MANAGE.MATCH_MANAGE_RESPONSE = '수락') AS AWAY_TEAM_NAME , MATCH_RESULT_HOMETEAM_SCORE , MATCH_RESULT_AWAYTEAM_SCORE , MATCH_DATE , MATCH_START_TIME , MATCH_END_TIME FROM MATCH, MATCH_RESULT, MATCH_MANAGE WHERE MATCH.MATCH_CODE = MATCH_RESULT.MATCH_CODE(+) AND MATCH.MATCH_CODE = MATCH_MANAGE.MATCH_CODE AND (MATCH.TEAM_CODE = #{teamCode} OR MATCH.TEAM_CODE_AWAY = #{teamCode}) AND MATCH.MATCH_POSSIBLE = '2' AND MATCH_MANAGE.MATCH_MANAGE_RESPONSE = '수락' AND MATCH_RESULT_HOMETEAM_SCORE IS NULL ORDER BY MATCH_CODE
